column4: What is the default root password in Ubuntu? My admin password does not work for "su -c xterm".
nothing
mta? (postfix) or client? (evolution)
the one which sends emails, server one likely
postfix
Do you need it if you just send an email from your computer? Cannot you use gmail's server for that?
you want a client then, like thunderbird or evolution
I use mutt.
yes and the default in ubuntu is evolution
so you want a client, not a server
Evolution is a graphical application?
client?
yes, its a graphical client
I get the error "Error sending message, child exited 1 ()." as I have this in .muttrc: set sendmail="postfix"
what are you trying to do?
you want to send an mail with your own smtp-server?
To send a mail by Mutt
apparently it is a must, since I cannot find another way
and you want to send the mail to?
local or internet
internet
maybe its better to use a smtp from gmx, google, hotmail or something else then setting aup a local mail-server
